attributes.action: Create a National Fancy Dress Day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In order to bring the people of the United Kingdom closer together and to help endgender more light-heartedness in a very serious and often dark time, I nominate the government create a National Fancy Dress day during which everyone dresses up in a silly costume for the day for no good reason other than to have a good time and a laugh. The Prime Minister would also be required to engage in this National Fancy Dress day to encourage the world to grow its sense of humour.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
